title: Bot Players
body:
For the love of the game... PLEASE RIOT do something about bots playing your game... it's Ruining your game you put so much love into...

Playing PVP or coop games normally has atleast 1 or more bots per side.
Played a couple of coop games... I was the only human in 3 games...

If you wanna keep this game alive... do something!

replies.body: Riot can't do anything to make that specific player better? What your asking is impossible. I guess Riot could give the unskilled players a bonus. Like more damage, but that is plain stupid then no-body is on a fair level playing-field. Riot aren't gods. Only that player can improve by themselves
I'm unsure what you mean by PVP because I haven't seen a bot in a very long time.
